text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Hello, Trainer! Please, take a seat opposite me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: What do you want to talk about today? Your friends? Or maybe tomorrow's dinner? … You can talk to me about anything.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, could it be that you just wanted to say hi?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I'm sorry! I always listen to my friends' stories here…… P-please forget about it～
